TopicTitle: Hello, not new to kerbal but new to the forums!

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone!

I have been playing kerbal for a while now. When i say a while, i mean 1000+ hours of kerbal.Now here i am, i Finally got around to going to make an account on the forums after reading tons of posts here (Mostly mods, and design crafts). I usually play with realism increasing mods like FAR (or NEAR), DRE for a more immersive playstyle that stock mode doesn't give. I make lots of design crafts and a lot of replicas of crafts IRL and mainly focus on making it look good and usually not very effecient. But hey, everyone has there own personal playstyle.

So yea, this is a good community and i hope i fit in!

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear that you've been enjoying the game. Since you like making replicas, you might find an audience over at the Spacecraft Exchange, if you're inclined to share them. Lots of creativity going around in that section of the forum.

Well, welcome.

We do have a great community here.

I was just like you, I had played KSP for like 700 hours before I joined.

There are lots of cool ideas here and post yours too!

See you around!
Welcome to the KSP community! Enjoy your stay!
